title: VS Code theme template
description: Defines the structure of a theme that can then be colored dynamically using a theme-palette.

background.description: Colors vscode workbench color properties that Theme Dojo considers background properties.

primary.description: Color-group: 'Primary Backgrounds'. This group always colors the editor. Primary & secondary background color groups should be configured so that they color a larger percentage of the overall sq-area of the editor than any other color groups. To read the full documentation on this (or similar) color groups @see https://github.com/JAYD3V/theme-dojo/README.md

secondary.description: Color-group: 'Secondary Backgrounds'. Includes properties that color large background areas. Primary & secondary background color groups should be configured so that they color a larger percentage of the overall sq-area of the editor than any other color groups. To read the full documentation on this (or similar) color groups @see https://github.com/JAYD3V/theme-dojo/README.md

accent.description: Color-group: 'Accented Backgrounds'. Generally the accent color opposes either the primary or secondary color group in way that makes the color theme aesthetically appealing. To read the full documentation on this (or similar) color groups @see https://github.com/JAYD3V/theme-dojo/README.md
